law.catch_line: On request, the Division shall provide a copy of a case record maintained under § 3-601 of this sub...
law.text:
On request, the Division shall provide a copy of a case record maintained under § 3-601 of this subtitle to a managing official of:
a correctional facility in another state if that state has made reciprocal provisions by law for providing records of its convicted criminals to the authorities of other states;
a federal correctional facility; and
a local correctional facility.
